Requirements You have a force field upgrade in your armor or are holding a tech shield.

You overcharge a shield to create a concussive blast that repulses nearby foes. You @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Area Fire] using your force field or shield, dealing @Damage[2d10[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage,forced-movement] damage in a @Template[burst|distance:5]{5-foot radius burst} centered on one corner of a square you occupy. This attack has the tracking +1 trait and is in the shield weapon group. A creature that fails its save is pushed back 5 feet. If you have the primary target class feature, the primary target Strike uses your force field or shield.

Special If you're using a force field or shield that's superior or better, the tracking trait increases to +2, or +3 if ultimate or better. Likewise, if it's elite or better, the damage increases to @Damage[3d10[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage,forced-movement|shortLabel], or @Damage[4d10[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage,forced-movement|shortLabel] if paragon.
